page.title: 07A T.V. STUDY
page.content: {A T.V study I looked at T.V. and radio programmes I found in a newspaper dated June 1967. I found out that T.V. started much later then than now. Some of the programmes are the same such as Coronation Street, the Avengers and the News.I did a survey on the number of hours my friends watch T.V. one girl watches on average six hours a day but most watch for three hours or less .My favourite T.V. programmes are Cheers, the Cosby Show and Brookside. I enjoy watching video films on a portable T.V in my bedroom.Some of my favourite films are Porkys,Bedknobs and Broomsticks,and Pete the Dragon.
